http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS List ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-10T15:39:06Z uzma akhtar 2015-02-10T15:38:57+00:00 2015-02-10T15:38:57+00:00 Recruitment at Pearson https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;2fd4157d.1502 Hello All<br>Hope you are all well and coping with work pressures.<br>You may know I am currently working at Pearson and we are trying to recruit authors, trainers and standards verifiers. I would be grateful if you could share this in your centres to all your staff or forward to anyone who maybe interested in doing additional part time work.<br>Opportunities to work with Pearson in authoring of BTEC teaching/learning materials (e.g. textbooks) and BTEC training (e.g. delivering 'Getting Ready to Teach' events) and standards verifyer<br>Authoring BTEC teaching/learning resourcesIf you are interested becoming an author of Pearson's BTEC [...] Maria Thompson 2014-08-13T10:16:44+00:00 2014-08-13T10:16:44+00:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;4c7ec659.1408 I'm useless at technology too - is there anyone out there who can help with this?<br>Maria<br><br>From: Communication list for aspiring principals [mailto:ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Janak Patel<br>Sent: 12 August 2014 13:37<br>To: ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Number 6 and another double for our class!<br><br>That's a good idea, Maria.<br><br>I'm not technically minded about setting up a group email but here are my details: [...] Janak Patel 2014-08-12T13:37:18+01:00 2014-08-12T13:37:18+01:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;23cf2040.1408 That's a good idea, Maria.<br><br>I'm not technically minded about setting up a group email but here are my details:<br><br>janakpatel@live.co.uk, 07825070666<br><br>Janak<br><br>Date: Mon, 11 Aug 2014 12:40:10 +0000<br>From: Mthompson@HAVERING-COLLEGE.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Number 6 and another double for our class!<br>To: ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br><br>Janak Congratulations on the new job \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd we never did get to have that drink! And also good news re Uzma \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd good to hear on both counts. I’m just relieved I wasn’t the sole recipient of the dietary advice! I don’t have a list I’m afraid \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd may be worth starting again with those who [...] Hamilton, Barbara 2014-08-11T14:15:53+00:00 2014-08-11T14:15:53+00:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;a7cc46ac.1408 Dear All,<br><br>It is so good hearing from everyone and seeing how everyone is progressing. It would be great to hear from Uzma and others, I have had no communication with her for several months. Congratulations to Janek and Jerry. I love the referenced to horseriders, very apt. It would be really good to meet up and have a chat before every goes off doing new and interesting things.<br>Regards [...] Rick Olver 2014-08-11T13:45:24+01:00 2014-08-11T13:45:24+01:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;5a2f9fe8.1408 Great to hear everyone is doing so well in their careers.<br><br>Donkey rides are off in Southend due to the unexploded munitions washed<br>up on the beach for the war.<br><br>If anyone is coming to Southend - it is not a place you pass through-you<br>have to want to come here- pop in a say hello. [...] Maria Thompson 2014-08-11T12:40:10+00:00 2014-08-11T12:40:10+00:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;da82af61.1408 Janak<br>Congratulations on the new job - we never did get to have that drink! And also good news re Uzma - good to hear on both counts.<br>I'm just relieved I wasn't the sole recipient of the dietary advice!<br>I don't have a list I'm afraid - may be worth starting again with those who are keen to keep up to date?<br>Regards<br>Maria [...] Janak Patel 2014-08-11T13:31:55+01:00 2014-08-11T13:31:55+01:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;e66c02cf.1408 Hi All<br><br>Apologies to all of you about the dietary advice - I was hacked into, got the same message and then my computer forwarded it to everyone in my address book. I have either upset or annoyed a lot of people.<br><br>Congratulations to Karen on her new post and to Uzma (not only did she get married, she also has a new job as a director at Pearsons - I think?) [...] Jerry Goodwin 2014-08-11T11:32:08+01:00 2014-08-11T11:32:08+01:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;844d2ac8.1408 Richard<br><br>It is good to hear that the building project is going well. Will you be on Grand Designs at any point? Is the idea to use the practical lessons learnt on your own new place to develop a business whereby you do it for others, either individuals or organisations?<br><br>Do you keep in touch with any of the others in our group? Karen did get back to me to confirm her appointment, so thanks for that. It is rumoured that Uzma got married again recently, but she has gone quiet on me too. Were you invited to the wedding [...] Maria Thompson 2014-08-06T13:33:13+00:00 2014-08-06T13:33:13+00:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;e90ab41.1408 Hello Jeremy<br>As ever it's really good to hear from you. I'm afraid I don't have either email address. I did see Karen in the press and remembered the grandchildren idea too! I also met the interim Principal at EHWLC and asked her to pass on my card to Garry but haven't heard anything. He is either avoiding me or busy making further waves - I hope to come across him at some London event or other. Hope you find something that suits you soon and please keep in touch<br>Regards<br>Maria [...] richard.everett@intelligentbuilders.co.uk 2014-08-06T12:05:06+01:00 2014-08-06T12:05:06+01:00 Re: Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;1dd7c1be.1408 Jerry<br><br>I have a personal email for Karen (through linked in) so will contact her and ask whether it is ok to give that to you to put on the list. I’ve blind copied her into this message too so she can see the context.<br><br>PS My building is really coming on now - I have underfloor heating down and am currently screeding over it. The doors and windows arrive in early september so should be properly watertight and rendered by end of september beginning of october. I am now fully qualified electrically so can sign off my own work [...] Jerry Goodwin 2014-08-06T10:20:02+01:00 2014-08-06T10:20:02+01:00 Number 6 and another double for our class! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;1a7a2ff6.1408 Let me explain.<br><br>As an FE itinerant I was browsing on the PC recently to get a list of colleges that might employ me that were within commuting distance of Reading. I believe that it always pays to spell the Principal's name correctly if you are, in effect, asking them to give you a job. Anyway, having just finished a contract at Peterborough Regional, a funny old place where I never once saw a copy of the TES or FE News, I knew I was a bit out of touch, so the work on Google became both interesting and important [...] Jerry Goodwin 2014-05-15T22:08:27+01:00 2014-05-15T22:08:27+01:00 Re: Request for advice on the assessment of BTECs in Business https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;90656e7d.1405 Kate<br><br>Thank you for this. Clive has responded quickly and Alison Dorman has already sent through some assignments for our team.<br><br>Everything else is fine, thank you.<br><br>Best Wishes<br><br>Jeremy<br>----- Original Message -----<br>From: Kate Webb<br>To: ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Sent: Monday, May 12, 2014 9:10 AM<br>Subject: FW: Request for advice on the assessment of BTEC's in Business<br><br>Dear Jerry, [...] Kate Webb 2014-05-12T09:10:15+01:00 2014-05-12T09:10:15+01:00 FW: Request for advice on the assessment of BTEC's in Business https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;adab95f1.1405 Dear Jerry,<br><br>See below. Clive Hodge, Director of Curriculum for this area is on the case. I suggest that you put your team in touch.<br><br>Hope everything else is OK<br><br>Regards<br><br>Kate<br><br>From: Clive Hodge<br>Sent: 12 May 2014 07:54<br>To: Kate Webb<br>Cc: Virginia Barrett<br>Subject: RE: Request for advice on the assessment of BTEC's in Business<br><br>Good Morning kate [...] Jerry Goodwin 2014-05-11T15:42:05+01:00 2014-05-11T15:42:05+01:00 Request for advice on the assessment of BTEC's in Business https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ASPIRING-PRINCIPALS;657e1bd1.1405 All<br><br>It is some time since we had a burst of e-mail activity. I hope all is well with you and yours. As you may have heard, I have fetched up in Peterborough on one of my interim management assignments, an AP role for six months which suits me fine. In my capacity as AP Quality and Standards I have been approached by the Extended Diploma in Business team with respect to the construction of their assignments. They believe that their approach is rather onerous for both staff and students and have asked me to use my good influences to [...]
